page.title: 07Farming
page.content: Most farming in th area is of the arable variety. Live-stock is restricted to some beef and sheep grazing. The Trout Farm has a hatchery and this provides a flourishing business for tourists and local restaurants. There are a few small scale market garden enterprises in the area. A good deal of the acreage is put down to oil seed rape,grain and potato crops together with the smaller vegetable croppage. There are a number of small-hold farms but mainly the land is farmed by two or three large farming companies.
